meanings.sent1: The hyperpigmented spot on the leaf stood out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperpigmented freckles were more noticeable in the summer sun.

meanings.definition: To cause an area of skin to become darker than the surrounding skin.
meanings.sent1: The sun exposure hyperpigmented her skin over time.
meanings.sent2: Certain foods can hyperpigment the skin if consumed in excess.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally hyperpigmented her hand while experimenting with dyes.
meanings.sent4: The artist used a special technique to hyperpigment the edges of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The cosmetic product promised not to hyperpigment the skin after use.
